cards.name: Add deadline to cards
cards.text: Display remaining days on card before deadline. Show days remaining only on cards that are not in "To Do" column.

cards.name: Add priority to cards
cards.text: Add priority to cards and order cards on columns by their priority.

cards.name: Add commenting feature to cards
cards.text: User can write, read, edit and delete comments on cards.

cards.name: Draw statistics
cards.text: Design and create statistics views to be shown on screen to users. Users can track their progress.

cards.name: Improve cards' readability
cards.text: Implement pagination for cards or something similar

cards.name: Make columns customisable
cards.text: User can create, delete or edit columns to their liking.

cards.name: Add dragging to cards
cards.text: User can drag cards to columns

cards.name: Add notification system
cards.text: Give feedback to user after action. Example after posting comment display message to user if action was succesfully or and error occured.
